title: Movies and Spoilers pt.1
itunes:title: Movies and Spoilers pt.1
itunes:subtitle: A Podcast from your favorite homeboy
description:
SPOILERS! SPOILERS! SPOILERS!

In this episode Napoleon and @Twonlack are joined by Raecine Tyes founder of the Black Film Festival Atlanta (https://www.blackfilmfestivalatlanta.com/t) and Director Edward Varnie (https://www.imdb.com/name/nm5212162/) AKA Knowledge.


A 2 part episode for all our cinephile homies. We discuss:

The Joker Movie (SPOILER)

The Black Film Festival Atlanta

Edward's newest digital release, Release

Death of a Wizard, Edwards Short

My name is Dolemite

some of our "favorite films" and our usual tangents.

This is a part 1 of a  2 part episode and there are spoilers for the Joker
